trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZD109_05108_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The bladewise Hoobigo is eyeing you with interest.
TEXT_KINGZD109_05108_TODO_00<tab>Survey the designated location and defeat any challengers that appear.

TEXT_KINGZD109_05108_OLDMANHOOBIGO05108_000_000<tab>You're part of the Third Promise's retinue, aren't you? Not many could stand a chance against Gulool Ja Ja in combat, shade or not. Been eager for a chance to take the measure of you.
TEXT_KINGZD109_05108_OLDMANHOOBIGO05108_000_001<tab>The young warriors who once trained here have long since left the forest in search of work. But Whetstone still has plenty of fighting spirit.
TEXT_KINGZD109_05108_OLDMANHOOBIGO05108_000_002<tab>Sure, we're all getting on in years, but we fought hand-to-hand with the Xbr'aal during the war. Our scales are stronger than steel.

TEXT_KINGZD109_05108_OLDMANHOOBIGO05108_000_003<tab>Care to test your mettle against Mamook's finest? I'll gather my comrades and meet you north of here. When you're ready, come and find us─and once victory's been decided, we'll meet back here.
TEXT_KINGZD109_05108_OLDMANHOOBIGO05108_000_004<tab>A victory worthy of your accolades, stranger. I only hope my hip makes a full recovery...
TEXT_KINGZD109_05108_OLDMANHOOBIGO05108_000_005<tab>Whetstone was once a gathering of young blood eager to sharpen their scales. Ah, to be young again...
TEXT_KINGZD109_05108_OLDMANHOOBIGO05108_000_006<tab>You've done an admirable job on your own scales, if I do say so myself. Does an old warrior proud.
TEXT_KINGZD109_05108_OLDMANHOOBIGO05108_000_007<tab>I suppose our time on the field is well and truly done. Now, we must do what we can to pass on our knowledge to those who would learn it.
TEXT_KINGZD109_05108_OLDMANHOOBIGO05108_000_008<tab>You have my thanks. My comrades and I will learn from our battle, and see that Whetstone hones the scales of many a young warrior to come.
